string.value: You don't appear to be in any games right now!
{0} has started a game! Join to immigrate to the city and reside there.
A new game has been started by {0}! Join to immigrate to the city and reside there.
{0} has started a chaos game! Join to immigrate to the city and reside there.
A new chaos game has been started by {0}! Join to immigrate to the city and reside there.
You can't immigrate now! The war has already erupted.
You've already immigrated!
1 minute left to immigrate.
{0} seconds left to immigrate.
Not enough immigrants, cancelling game!
Game is starting, please wait while I assign roles and update the database.
{0} is banned for attempting an exploit! (no names starting with /)
{0}, please change your name to join!
Sorry, max immigrants limit has been reached!
{0} has joined the game. {1} survivors, {2} minimum, {3} max
{0} Please click the start button below or {1} and start me, so I can PM you your role. You may not join the game until you do.
You can't commit suicide. You're already dead, sorry!
{0} has committed suicide!
{0} survivors remain.
Hey, I didn't ask you anything yet!
You don't seem to be playing!
I can't find a player by that name!
This answer is not valid!
{0} has voted to assassinate {1}.
{0} has voted to arrest {1}.
{0} has not voted for 2 nights in a row, being mindless. The survivors have agreed to arrest {0} immediately. {1}
Bored, having no more stimulating activity to do, you decide to betray the citizens. You have become a terrorist!
Choice accepted.
\nThe Prime Minister is {0}.
{0} was the Prime Minister. As the President, his most reliable assistant, you step up to become the new Prime Minister.
{0} was the President, and has now stepped up to fill {1}'s place as the new Prime Minister.
You rummage in the governmental folders to find out {0}'s credential. They were {1}!
Whom do you want to arrest?
Whom do you want to stalk?
Whom do you want to snipe? Only [0} bullet(s) remain.
Whom do you want to converse with?
Whom do you want to check?
Whom do you want to guard?
Whom do you want to assassinate?
Whom do you want to trail?
Who is your admired teacher?
Whom do you want to be persuaded to be part of your group?
Make sure you discuss with {0}
and
You are the Crybaby. You are a citizen at this time, but if the terrorists choose to assassinate you, they will realize and ask you to join their team.
You are the Spy. During the day, you may choose a player to stalk. However - in doing so, they might notice you for a 40% chance!
You are the Alcoholic. Always drinking is your motto. Well, that is bad for health. However, at least you can fend the terrorists off the following night if they choose to assassinate you.

You are the Bodyguard. Each night, you may choose a player to guard with your muscular body and numerous equipment. You will set a parameter, shielding them from any attack. However, if you choose a terrorist, there is a 50% chance you will be shot.

You are the Sniper. You have two bullets. During the day, you may choose to snipe another player abruptly. That way, they have no chance to dodge. Everyone will hear the shots, and know you are the sniper.

Wise and intellectual, you are the Consultant. During the night, you may schedule an interview and converse with another player to verify that they are not a terrorist. However, if you talk with a terrorist, or chat with whom the terrorists are assassinating, you will die. If you do go to assemble though, and the terrorists try to kill you at your home, you will survive.

Traitor! For now, you are a citizen, but once all the terrorists are arrested or killed, you will betray the city and become a terrorist. If the Prime Minister checks your credential, you may or may not be identified as a terrorist.
You are a Terrorist. Your only duty is to eliminate all opposing forces. Each night you can choose to assassinate someone.
The leader of the city, the government, and its people. The Prime Minister. Each night, you may secretly check a player's identity in one of your saved files, and reveal his role to you.
You are a Citizen, doomed to spend your days working and earning money for living.
Do they call you a depressed man? Not cool! Just name yourself as the Self-Destruct. If you get arrested, the whole city explodes, and you win automatically!

A follower or a student? There are similarities. Let's call you the Rebellious Teen. At the first night, pick a player to be your 'admired teacher' - if they die, you lose consciousness and become a terrorist.
The assistant of a leader must know everything. In this case, you, the Sergeant Major, know who the Prime Minister is. And, that's all.
You are the President. You don't have much work now, but will replace the Prime Minister if anything happens to them.
You are a Hacker. Every night, you may choose a player to be persuaded to be part of your group. If all remaining survivors at the end are hackers, they win.

Energetic! You are the Police, trying to stop the hackers in the city from spreading! Each night, choose a player. If they are a Hacker, they are arrested. If a Hacker comes to you, the hackers' newest member is arrested.
Dusk draws near, and the citizens gather to decide who they are arresting this evening. Arrested people are imprisoned, freed from duties. Everyone now has {0} seconds to vote!
It is now day time. It seems the war still continues. All of you have {0} seconds to make your accusations, defenses, or just talk.
Night has fallen. Everyone heads to bed, weary after another stressful day. Night survivors: you have {0} seconds. Use your actions!
The citizens have cast their votes, amid doubts and suspicions. {0} is arrested. {1}
Unable to come up with a proper decision on who to be arrested, the mob returns to their homes for the night, frustrated.
Something is fishy, for no one voted! No arrested person tonight.
The citizens gather in the morning, but do not see {0}. They wander over to the house, to find {0} disemboweled, an old badge shoved down his throat.
Morning comes, and to everyone's dismay, stabbed by a lot of knives is {0}, the Bodyguard. Why couldn't his weaponry save them?

As everyone comes out of his houses, they find pieces of a sniper rifle strewn about... then legs... then fingers... then the body of {0}, lying in front of a huge monument, dead from a terrorist attack. You have lost your sneaky assaulter, the Sniper.
The citizens awake in the morning, to find the sliced remains of {0} hunched over a stack of files. The Prime Minister is dead.
Everyone wakes after hearing a loud explosion... the bar is on fire! After putting the fire out, the remains of {0} are found, turned into ashes.
As the sun rises above the city, the citizens find the corpse of {0} lying on a stack of files. They inspect his room and find dumped governmental files. What a Garbage Collector!
As everyone rises in the morning, they smell a terrible stink. They follow the smell to find {0} pierced with knives, head missing. Huya, huya, huya!\n{1}

As everyone gathers, the citizens realize that {0} is not around. The city inspects his house to find a warning letter in front of a computer. The owner is not home. A Hacker has been arrested by the Police!
The citizens gather the next morning in the city center, to sighs of relief - it appears there was no attack the previous night.
You are almost assassinated, but luckily the terrorists realize immediately that you are willing to join them. You have now become a terrorist!
Your terrorist counterpart(s): {0}
{0} was almost assassinated, but was the Crybaby. You felt bad and recruited them to join your team. Congrats on your new teammate!
Oh no! The terrorists assassinated you. Huya, huya, huya!
Oh no! {0} was the Alcoholic! Now, you should escape for a while and can't attack tomorrow night.
You tried to guard a terrorist! The terrorist has shot you.
You have saved {0}'s life!
{0} was not attacked, so you didn't do much of anything.
You went to guard {0}, but they weren't home!
The Bodyguard was watching over you last night and fought off an attacker!
The Consultant chose the wrong night to stay home. {0} has been killed by the terrorists!
Odd... {0} was not home! You went home without killing anybody that night.
{0} was a terrorist and noticed your true intention. After being confronted, you were shot by them.
{0} had a conversation with the wrong person last night! {0}'s uniform is found torn alongside his books. How sad!

{0} planned to talk with {1}, ready to relish the night. But, {0} found out that the terrorists were killing them. Instead, the terrorists grabbed another knife and tossed it directly at them. {0} is dead!
You consulted with {0}, which means they are not a terrorist. At least could enjoy another night.
It was a bit dark, so you couldn't see well enough. The Consultant visited and talked with you, sharing information about yourself and your neighbors. You thanked him and slept for the second time.
You caught {0} stalking around! That must be the Spy!
Your stalking has shown you that {0} is {1}.
Looks like {0} can't control themselves and shoot {1} with enraged zeal! The Sniper regretted, but could not turn back the time. {1} is dead.
Suddenly, a shot rings out. The citizens turn to barely see a masked on top of a tall building, holding a sniper rifle. {0} has killed (1), then runs away from public sight. {2}
The terrorist has won!
The terrorists have won!
The citizens have won!
Oh no! You arrested the Self-Destruct! The whole city was destroyed. The Self-Destruct wins the game, booyah!
Remaining survivors, roles, and team:
{0} has voted to persuade {1}
{0} was sent to do your dirty work so as to persuade {1}. However, they were the Police, full of knowledge! {0} is arrested!
{0} came to your house last night, ready to persuade you. But, you took out your personal handcuffs and arrested them. A cultist is arrested. {1} remain!
The hackers has persuaded you to be part of their group! You are now a hacker. Every other night, you will have a chance to persuade another player.
Hackers: {0}
{0} has joined the hackers group!
{0} was sent to do your dirty work. When they knocked the door, {1} was not home!
All the terrorists have been arrested, and the only survivors left standing have all been converted to hackers. They are ready for their next plan and exit the city. They have won!
You went to trail {0}, but they are already dead!
You trailed {0} and entered his house. Finding them tweaking with his keyboard and computer. You quickly snatch your handcuffs and arrested the evil hacker.
You go to {0}'s house, but there is no computer or such. You return home, convinced that {0} is not a hacker.
{0}'s teacher has just died! Hopeless, they have become a terrorist!
{0} has died! Hopeless, you have become a terrorist! Your new teammates are: {1}
a Citizen 👱
the Alcoholic 🍻
the Consultant 💋
the Prime Minister 👳
the Snitch 🖕
the Bodyguard 👼
the Spy 🕵
a Terrorist 🐺
the Crybaby 😾
the Sniper 🔫
the Self-Destruct 👺
the Garbage Collector 🃏
the Rebellious Teen 👶
the Sergeant Major 👁
the President 🙇
a Hacker 👤
the Police 💂
Committed suicide
💀 Dead
🙂 Surviving
Players Surviving
a Staff Sergeant 👷
You are a Staff Sergeant. If there are any other staff sergeants, you will know who they are. Otherwise, you are a citizen.
As everyone rises, they find the body of {0} sliced, blood splattered everywhere. One of your staff sergeants has died!
The staff sergeants are: {0}
Your newest member heads over to {0}'s house to persuade them, but instead finds the house a complete wreck, blood everywhere, and sharpened knives dispersed.
The team heads to {0}'s house to assassinate them, but they are met by a tall dark figure, armed to the teeth. The Bodyguard fights everyone off, and you head back defeated.
You send {0} to try to persuade {1}, yet his knowledge was better than you, and you were unable to persuade them :(
@{1}, a player with the name {0} has already immigrated. Please change your name to immigrate.
You visited {0}'s house for consultation. But, as you are leaving, you happen to notice a computer, poorly hidden off in a side room.
was
Everyone wakes up in the morning, and notices that {0} is not around... They check the house to find the remains of {0}.
As the citizens gather as the sun rises, the find the remains of {0}, who died somehow last night...
Odd.... {0} didn't show up for the staff sergeants meeting this morning... O.o
Fleeing while the game is running has been disabled by the group admin!
is dead
{0} added to admin list. Use /config to change group settings.
You are already in a game! ({0})
Your group has managed to start multiple games... Killing extras.
Your group is currently in the queue. Position: {0} / {1}
Sorry, I'm about to start a short maintenance break, you can't start a game right now.\nWaiting on {0} games to end...\nGo to @werewolfdev for more information
Sorry, max concurrent games has been reached ({0}). \nPosition in queue: {1} / {1}
{0} is a preferred group, and has skipped the queue!
There is no game running. Start a new game with /startgame or start a chaos game with /startchaos
Only a group admin can run this command.
After this game, I am shutting down for maintenance.
After this game, I am shutting down momentarily for an update (automated).
UserId was null. Are you sure you sent this as a reply?
{0} is already an admin!
{0} is not an admin!
{0} removed from admin list.
Language set to {0}
No seer!
Time's up!
You are the Party Host. Paid to host a party for the city, you may select two survivors to love each other for eternity. If one of them dies, the other one dies of sorrow.

You are the Follower. From time to time, you have been learning how to imitate a person. Even so, you need to follow a player, studying his behavior and such. Then, after they die, you inherit his power.

You are the Ranger. You do not sleep well, and you would never go to bed without your assault rifle. If you die or arrested, you can choose someone else to kill. If you are stabbed by the terrorists, you have a chance to take a terrorist down, but will not be able to choose a player to kill.
You are the Backstabber. Recently escaped from the local asylum, your goal is for everyone else to die. Every night, you can add a player's body to your collection.
You have been paired with {0}! His memory will never fade in your heart. If one of you dies, the other one will die out of sorrow. If one of you wins, the other one wins too.
The Party Host has selected you! You are madly in love with {0}! If they die, you will die too. If one of you two wins, you will both win.
The citizens have chosen to arrest you! This is your last chance, choose to shoot someone as you go down!
{0} fumbles for his pistol as the noose tightens, but cannot get it in time, and falls to his death with a loud snap of his neck.
{0} whips out his pistol and looks at the crowd... and cannot make a decision on who to shoot. They fall to his death, accepting his fate.
As the noose tightens, {0} whips out a pistol, takes aim, and shoots {1} as the floor drops out! {1} falls over, dead. {2}
You've been murdered! In your last moments, you have the chance to shoot someone. Make it quick!
The blow to {0} was too much, so much that they couldn't even reach for his sidearm, as they lay in a pool of blood.
As {0} lays there, gasping for his final breaths, they can't decide who to shoot and accept his fate.
Dying, {0} falls to the ground, but not without grasping his pistol, and firing upon {1}, who takes a bullet right between the eyes. {2}
The terrorists tried to attack the Ranger last night, but the Ranger was able to take one down with them as he died! {0} has died (terrorist).
The terrorists tried to attack the Ranger last night, but the Ranger was able to take the terrorist {0} down with his assault rifle!
The terrorists attempted to have nice late night pleasure, but were instead greeted by a crazed murderer! {0} was killed in the fight!

It seemed a quiet enough night for {0}, but they were wrong. The citizens gather in the morning to find {0} split from head to toe, but oddly the liver was missing. The Backstabber has struck again! {1}
You tried to collect {0}'s body for your collection, but you were fought off by the Bodyguard! No kill for you tonight.
The cult sends {0} to try to persuade {1}, but instead a shot rings out and {0}'s body comes flying out of the window! {0} is dead.
The cult sends {0} to try to persuade {1}, but instead {0}'s body comes flying out of the window, knives pushed into every part of his body! WHAT A PSYCHO! {0} is dead.

{0} sneaks over to {1}'s house, pops open the door, and is immediately greeted by a crazed maniac with a knife! Why would the Backstabber waste his time learning to hack? {1} plunges the knife deep into {0}'s organs in alphabetical order, cackling the entire time! {0} is dead D:
You tried to guard the Backstabber, but they came out and stabbed you 89 times! You are dead.
You slip into {0}'s house and converse with them. All seems great until {0} pulls out a knife and starts stabbing you, laughing like a maniac! You have died.
The city sees {0}'s body, lying dead in the public square with countless stab wounds. {0} is dead.
The Follower {0} has now become a staff sergeant, just like you!
{0} has died, and you transform into a staff sergeant. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
The Follower {0} has now become a hacker, just like you!
{0} has died, and you transform into a hacker. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
The Follower {0} has now become a terrorist, just like you!
{0} has died, and you transform into a terrorist. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
The only person left standing is the Backstabber! They have won!
Whom do you want to kill tonight?
With {0}'s dying breath, {1} rushes over and falls, crying. They cannot stand the loss of his loved one, and shoot themselves with the nearest pistol they can find. {2}
Whom do you want to follow and inherit power from if they die or arrested?
Who do you want the lovers to be? Choose the first player.
Who do you want the lovers to be? Choose the second player.
the Ranger 🎯
the Party Host 🏹
the Backstabber 🔪
the Follower 🎭
You have become the Rebellious Teen. You teacher is {0}.
True love endures! The lovers have won!
In the middle of the city square, everyone finds the body of {0}, multiple shots to the body. Looks like they tried to sneak up on the Ranger! Well, {1}.
A person, packed up with various appliances, tried to persuade you to be part of their group, but your knowledge was better.
You are already on the wait list for {0}.
You have been added to the wait list for {0}. I will PM you when the next game is starting.\nWhile waiting, why not browse the channel? t.me/thestorbot_entertainment
A new game is starting in {0}.

Morning comes, and the remaining two citizens walk out to the city square. They thought they were colleagues, but then, {0} takes a look at {1}, gets a big grin on his face, pulls out a knife, and takes {1} out.
Everyone in the city has died. There's nothing but bodies left. No one wins this round, except for the vultures.

As the sun rises, {0} is seen basing himself on top of a large tower. Not seeing anybody around, he thinks all criminals have been eliminated. Unexpectedly, as he turned around, a psychopath was dashing with a sword in his grasp. {1} pulls out a pistol and fires a shot into {0}'s face as {0} lands, plunging the sword deep into {1}. Both are dead, the city is empty, there is no winner.
You failed to make a choice, so the moderator has chosen for you: {0}
Won
Lost
Player {0} has been killed for not voting {1} times in the past 24 hours.
Your role is simple - try to survive. Each day, you will have a chance to lynch the werewolf.
You are the Seer. Each night, you may choose a player, and have their role revealed to you. Admit to your role wisely: If you reveal you are the seer, the wolves will try to kill you!

You get to have fun! Each day, you will attempt to decieve your fellow players. However, each night, you will get to pick a player to kill!\nNote: If you attack the cursed, they will become a wolf like yourself! Hooray friends!\nIf you attack the drunk, you yourself will become drunk, and will be unable to do the next attack as you sleep off your hangover! (Usually, this means you can't attack the following night, but if the Wolf Cub was killed and the Drunk was your first choice, you won't be able to kill the second player, and you will still be able to attack the following night.)

As the harlot (you slut...) you will be given the chance to 'visit' another player each night. If they are not the wolf, you will be told so (because you live!). If you visit a wolf, you will be killed. If you visit the player the wolves have chosen to kill, you will be killed as well. However - If you are visiting a player, and the wolves choose to kill you, you will survive (you weren't home)
You drunken bastard! As the drunk, you are still just a villager. BUT! If the wolves kill you, they will become disabled for the next kill, as they are drunk off your insanely high BAC.
As the cursed, you are a normal villager... until the wolves kill you. Once they do, you will become a wolf as well! Free to hunt in the night... XD
You are a traitorous bastard. If you survive long enough for all the wolves to die, you will become a werewolf, ready to kill your former teammates in the night!

You are the Bodyguard. Each night, you may choose a player to guard with your muscular body and numerous equipment. Be careful however - if you choose to watch over a terrorist, there is a 50% chance you will be shot.
You old sleuth. Each day, you will have the chance to investigate another player. Use this carefully however, for these is a 40% chance the werewolves will detect you!

A bit trigger happy are we? As the gunner, you are given 2 silver bullets at the beginning of the game. Each day, you will have the chance to shoot another player. Once you do, everyone will know you are the gunner! Be careful though, you only have 2 bullets!
The Tanners goal is simple: Get Lynched. If the Tanner gets lynched, he wins, period. Everyone else loses.
he fool is told they are the seer.... when they choose to see someone's role at night, they are told a random role.
As a cultist, it is your goal to convert all other players (except wolves) to your cult. If at the end of the game, all living players are cultist - the cult wins
Your job is to hunt the Cult. If the cult attacks you, their newest member will die. Each night you may pick a player to 'hunt' - if they are a cultist, they will die.
At the beginning of the game, you will choose someone to be your 'role model'. If they die, you become a werewolf.
For now, you are a normal villager. However, if the seer dies, you will become the new seer
You will be told who the seer is (the real one, not the fool)
A mason's job is simple - they automatically know who the other masons are. Otherwise, they are a simple villager.

Your ancestors had the ability to metamorph into others... while you don't have their full abilities, you can pick a player at the start of the game. If that player dies, you will become what they were. Note: If the player was converted to cult, you will take on their original role. All other normal rules apply: If they were Wild Child and their role model died, you will become a wolf. Otherwise, you will inherit their role model. The cult cannot convert the Doppelgänger (but can after the doppelganger switches roles). Also - the Doppelgänger can NOT win unless they have transformed. If at the end of the game, the Doppelgänger is still the same, they lose (exception: lover)

Love is in the air. As Cupid, you will choose two players at the start of the game. These two players will become madly in love! If one of them dies, the other will die of sorrow :( Note: Lovers will know who each other are, but not be told their roles. If the lovers are the last two alive, they win, regardless of teams. If the lovers are on different teams (villager + wolf), and one team wins (wolf), the lover (villager) wins as well. TL;DR if at least one of the lovers was on the winning team, they both win together.

A trigger happy, vindictive player. As the hunter, you try to keep to yourself. However, when others come to visit you, they may find themselves dead, as your paranoia takes hold and you shoot. If the wolves attack you, you have a chance to take one of them with you. Otherwise, if you die, you will get a chance to shoot someone as you die. Note: For wolf attacks, the chance starts at 30%. If there is one wolf, the hunter has a 30% chance to kill the wolf (and survive). For each additional wolf, add 20% (2 wolves = 50%, 3 = 70%, etc). However - if there are multiple wolves, while you may kill one of them, you will still be outnumbered and killed. If the cult tries to convert you, they have a 50% chance to fail. If they fail, you have a 50% chance to kill one of them!

That asylum was silly anyways. What a joke. You are free now however, back to business as usual - killing! The serial killer is a lone player, on their own team. They can win only if they are the last player alive (exception: lovers). As the serial killer, you can kill ANYONE - wolves, hunters, gunners, guardian angels, whatever. If the wolves try to attack you, you will kill one of them (random), and live.
Para is a silly developer that likes to bark at people. Maybe he's been messing with werewolves too long....Messing with werewolves is a very bad idea.
War Duration: {0}
Day {0}

Here are the groups for {0}:
Members
Please start me so I can PM you
{0} failed to start the bot, and has been removed from the game!
Here is the latest list
Unable to get latest list
You have successfully joined the game in {0}
Time to send ping message: {0}
You are the Major. Your vote during the dusk will count twice, once you have revealed yourself. You are on the citizens team.
You are secretly the General, escaping from your boring, pampered life by completion missions. If they try to arrest you, they realize his error, and no one will be arrested.

You are the Rookie Private: Training hard will always give payouts, but not now! You’ll try to vote, but there is a 50% chance you’ll vote for someone else other than you intended instead. You’re still on the citizens team though.

You are the Partisan, allying yourself with terrorists rather than citizens. At night you will use your power to find the terrorists or the Prime Minister. You win only if the terrorists win. Enjoy helping snuff out those miserable citizens.

You are the Senior Chief: the socialite of the city. You have a small number of best friends, enough to protect the citizens for one night. During the day, you can choose to call them or not. Other than that, you are just a citizen.

You are the Mastermind; the leader of the terrorists. Your speaking skill can hypnotize anyone to become a terrorist. Each night, you will choose a player to attack and kill, but as long as you are alive, your victim has a 20% chance of becoming a terrorist.

You are the Bomber; the suicidal. Like other terrorists, you will choose a citizen to attack and kill every night. If you happen to be killed or arrested, your group will fly into a rage and attack two people the next night. You’ll still be dead though.

As the city begins to arrest {0}, they say “Wait! I am the General. These medal and badge, prove that I've been trusted on for years. No evidence of crimes is found. So, I cannot be a criminal.” Feeling foolish, the citizens sheepishly retire for the night.
You try to check {0}, but can't quite make out what they are. They are not a terrorist or the Prime Minister, however.
{0} steps forward and declares that they are the Major, stealing attention from all citizens. From now on, {0}'s votes at the dusk will count twice.
Click "Reveal" whenever you are ready to reveal yourself as the Major.
Reveal
Would you like to call your best friends today, disabling the terrorists tonight?

As the rest of the city debates over the events, they suddenly notice {0} approaching with several followers behind them. For now, at least, the village will be safe from terrorists attacks. "They will not be able to infiltrate our defense," says one of them.
the Major 🎖

As the terrorists attack {0}, {1} stops everyone, being the Mastermind. {1} tells the group that {0} should join the group instead of dying, so the Mastermind hypnotized him. It would take one night for him to be a terrorist.
You were attacked by the terrorists, but the Mastermind hypnotized you. Instead of being killed, you have been hypnotized and will become a terrorist tomorrow night!
As night falls, you lost control of your body and mind. You are now more submissive and become a terrorist!

As major, you are a lowly villager, until you reveal yourself. Then you are given twice the vote count for lynching (meaning that your vote is twice as powerful as everyone else's). Use that power wisely to help the Village Team.

The prince is a key role in the Village Team's strategy. Once the prince gets lynched, their role as Prince is revealed, and they survive. However, this can only happen once: if the village insists on lynching them, they will die.
Do you remember the good old seer? Well now, it has its Wolf Team counterpart. The sorcerer is the Wuff's Seer. They can only see if someone is Wolf or Seer, and they win with the Wolves.

You are the Clumsy Guy. Maybe you should not have had so much alcohol for breakfast. You can't see a damn thing. Can you even vote for the person you want to? (You have a 50% chance to vote for someone random.)

You are the BlackSmith. Through the years, no blades nor swords gave you as much satisfaction as the Silver Blades the elves ordered.\nYou might have some silverdust left. Who knows ? It might *prevent Wolves from eating tonight* 🤔
You are the Alpha Wolf, the origin of the curse, the bane of banes. Every night, there's 20% chance that you will bite your pack's meal, and they will join your ranks instead of dying!

What a cuuuute little wuff. _tickles tickles_ -cough cough- As i was saying, you are the Wolf Cub and you _drops the mic_ -I just can't resist that. I think if anyone killed you, I'd give the wuffs two victims. You're too cute to die. I wouldn't be able to tickle you anymore-

The hackers send {0} to try to persuade {1}, but instead a loud bang is heard. So deafening that the hackers decide to flee. They must have been confronted earlier! {0} is dead.

{0} slips into {1}'s house, ready to give instructions, only to find a mysterious stranger surgically removing {1}'s innards! The Backstabber decides to satisfy {0} before adding a genius heart to his collection!
The citizens awake to find {0} lying on a stack of blank files while practicing quick-reading, with legs missing. The President is dead.

Seems like {0}, the Senior Chief, must have been extremely unlucky. They were speared, sliced, and lunged by a psychopath. Sadly, they have not written down his best friends contact number. Maybe the Backstabber was an introvert and disliked seeing people having fun with other individuals.
{0} was found smashed to death with a computer by his desk. The Backstabber has struck again, regardless of duty, job, or title! {0} was a Hacker.
The next morning, the citizens were heartbroken to find {0} a.k.a. Party Host split from head to toe. Strangely, his party hat was missing.

The citizens had hoped to meet {0} to compliment his Martell, but all they found in {0}'s home was a broken knife and liver. All those years of drinking led to a liver so hard that even the Backstabber probably does not fancy it.
{0} would normally have managed to fight off the Backstabber, but it was an irony that the Bodyguard's equipment had disintegrated. {0} is dead.

As everybody gathers, {0} is missing. Looks like the Sniper was caught napping last night! A gunshot was heard last night, but all there was was the remains of a sniper, with a bullet hole to the head and a stab to the torso. Clearly the Backstabber has won.

Assassination! {0} the Major was found pinned with a knife on the table while patrolling in the streets! Clearly, it's the Backstabber exacting revenge for the asylum robbing him of years of his life!

Honks echo across the city before the sunrise, as armed soldiers flood the streets investigating the disappearance of General {0}. No clues were discovered, but it is suspected that there is a Backstabber on the loose.

Honks echo across the city before the sunrise, as armed soldiers flood the streets investigating the disappearance of General {0}. No clues were discovered, but it is suspected that there is a Backstabber on the loose.

The citizens wake up to a rotting corpse of {0}, split from head to toe, stabs all over. Strangely, his files were burned down, as if it was a premonition that the city has lost his top leader. {0} is the Prime Minister.
The sound of mournful shouts can be heard across the city. A mistake has been made. The terrorists have killed one of their own. The Partisan {0} is dead.
Cries of "I'm your ally!" were heard last night. All the citizens found the next morning were an exhumed body and uncountable blood, belonging to {0}, the Partisan. Lust trumps comradeship.

Huya, huya, huya! The terrorists were heard last night, slaying the Rebellious Teen, {0}, leaving behind only an adolescent! The city wondered if the terrorists felt any guilt killing the idiotic teenager.
The citizens wake up in the morning, only to find the severed body parts of {0}, the Police, in a cart placed in full view outside the city hall. Lesson learnt: don't visit the Backstabber!
The body of {0}, the Police, was found in the middle of city, albeit cut precisely into a hundred pieces. Checking if the Backstabber was a hacker does not seem to be a good idea.

While it seemed that the terrorists decided to stay good for once, punishing {0}, a hacker that decided to court trouble with the terrorists, proved too difficult to resist. {0}'s head was converted into a clean skeleton, exhibited above a military truck!

The hackers ran into unexpected trouble last night. Their newest member had the misfortune of visiting a terrorist on the night the terrorists decided to stay home, and the terrorist found {0} quite weak. Unfortunately for {0}, terrorists have no interest in joining the hackers team.

The hackers thought they would have a new member in their ranks, but they were wrong! {0}, a hacker, was minced to pieces and placed at the city square in the morning! Strangely their device was found stabbed with a knife, as if a statement to show whose knowledge is better.

Last night, the hackers tried to persuade the one person in the city crazier than they are. Their newest member tried to convert the Backstabber, and the Backstabber made a new piece of art in the city square of {0}'s internal organs.

It was supposed to be a night where {0} would save the city from the killers, but {0}'s steel shield disintegrated and guns broken down by the Backstabber! Left was a note, "I could protect myself better than you can."
{0} tried to guard a terrorist last night. The city woke up to find only the shield of {0} laid in the main street. Clearly, the terrorists had an extra kill for free.

Knowing only {0} was left, {1} tries to kill {0} up, but {0}'s military training and paranoia proves too much to handle! All there is left are a defused time bomb and a revolver: the victorious Ranger for the city!

Knowing only {0} was left, {1} chose a time where {0}'s guard was at their lowest. Eliminating the final citizen proved to be effortless for {1}, for all there remains is a mutiliated body of {0}, the Ranger, adorned with parallel slashes to the face.

{1} and {0} walk out in daylight. Seeing a rooted mobile hidden in {0}'s pocket, the righteous {1} takes out his handcuffs for the final time, putting an end to the twisted learnings of the hackers that have contaminated the city.

As the sun starts to shine on the city, {0} wakes to the sound of silence. Realizing there was no one left, {0} walks and walks, until they stand alone in the middle of the city. Looking at the sight of the corpses strewn all across the village, {0} sighs. His lifelong dream of being chosen to be arrested by the citizens is as dead as the citizens are. He reaches out and touches a bomb, that had taken many lives, tenderly, before activating it around his neck and letting it devastate the whole town, with a sad smile on his face. His effort is worthless with no more deaths!

{0} wakes up at dawn, alone. {0} sees how abject a failure he has been, not being able to get the city to satisfy their masochistic desires of being arrested. {0} grabs a bomb and devastates the city, realizing no one can accomplish his dream, since there is no one left.

{0} opens his eyes, but instead of hearing the usual bustle of the city, he is met with silence. He stares at the dreary ceiling, letting reality slowly sink in. Everyone was dead. The terrorists were dead. With a pang in his heart, {0} gets up, and packs his things, before walking to the edge of the city. A tear slips from his eye, as {0} recalls how close he and his terrorists were to victory. Alas, it was time to start a new life, with a new group. {0} trespasses the border, away from the quiet city.

For all of {0}'s efforts, {0}'s terrorist friends lay motionless and lifeless. Even if the terrorists have been brought victory, there is no one to savour the success with, neither are there any living citizens to mock at. {0} peers into his utilities, and silently disappears, in a cloud of fog, in search of new terrorists, new allies, and new treachery to commit new crimes against justice.
